title: Daimajuu Gekitou: Hagane no Oni
synopsis: In the year 1999, a team of UN scientists in an attempt to tap into a new energy resource on a deserted island called Sansara, unknownigly open a portal to another universe, unleashing dormant biomechanical entities. Three years later, Takuya Goroza returns to the island of Sansara urged by a mysterious request by college chum Haruka Alford. Little does he know, his old friend isn't what he appears to be...
staff: [['Hirano, Toshiki', ['Director']], ['Oobari, Masami', ['Key Animation', ' Animation Director']], ['Onda, Naoyuki', ['Animation Director', ' Key Animation', ' Character Design']], ['Ohata, Koichi', ['Key Animation', ' Mechanical Design']]]
